data.title: Robert Randolph [and the Family Band] Live at Greenfield Lake Amphitheater on 2009
data.meta_description: Robert Randolph & the Family Band  28 April 2009 - Greenfield Lake Amphitheater, 1941 Amphitheatre Drive, Wilmington, NC  01. crowd, tuning02....
data.text:
Notes

Robert Randolph (Robert Jermaine Randolph) - pedal steel guitar, guitar, vox, b.vox

Danyel Morgan - bass, stomps, claps, b.vox, vox

Marcus Randolph - drums, percussion, stomps, claps, b.vox

Red - Hammond B-3 organ, keys, b.vox

Lenesha "sister" Randolph ("little sister") - b.vox, vox

Adam "Shmeeans" Smirnoff - guitar

location: right front corner of foh; on stand approx. 7'

source: schoeps mk41 (DINa) -> kc5 -> cmc6 -> apogee mini-mp -> tascam hd-p2 @ 96 kHz 24 bit

transfer: tascam hd-p2 -> firewire -> vision computers custom desktop

edits: channels summed & balanced, normalized, fades added, flac'd & track split in magix sound forge 16.1.1

taped by: team no drama

contact jadedphan@hotmail.com with questions, concerns, or complaints

vg NOTES (6/8/2023):

--Super BIG Thanks to jadedphan & team no drama for recording & for sharing this Robert Randolph & the Family Band 2009 show. Absolutely Appreciated & a great capture!!

--Black Joe Lewis & the Honeybears opened the show

--I corrected some of the song titles toward how they appear on the original albums & uncovered the titles of t05,

--added the band members info

--no matter how hard I tried & searched & cross-referenced & such, I simply could not find any more info on their organ/keys player on this night other than RR intro'ing him during t14 as "Red"...if anyone knows who this cat actually is, won't you please chime in with that info & let us all know??

--aded more detail to the setlist info

--added more detail to the venue info

--created an md5 checksum file

--I left the original text file in here, renamed as 'originalinfo'

--added pics of the venue & one of the band performing at this gig
